name: Külmking
description: The Külmking is a large undead creature with a menacing presence, showcasing its chaotic evil nature. It has strong physical attributes and notable offensive capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to corrupt souls and turn living creatures into new Külmking, as well as its incorporeal movement, makes it a formidable foe.
goals: To corrupt other creatures and dominate through fear and physical prowess.
relations: Related to necromantic creatures and other undead beings.
environment: Often found in dark, desolate areas or places of death and decay.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage, as well as having a very good passive perception.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and spells that target undead.
attacks: Capable of multiattack with claws, bite, and hooves; each attack carries additional effects like paralysis or healing through necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Corruption allows it to inflict chaotic evil on others, creating more Külmking from the fallen.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet and a high passive perception of 18.
skills: Possesses strong perception skills with a bonus of +8.
additional_information: Resistant to cold and lightning damage.
Can move through creatures and objects.
Has a trampling charge that knocks targets prone.
Immune to conditions like being charmed or exhausted.
Regains hit points through its necrotic bite attack.
test_queries: large undead creature with soul corruption ability
powerful monster that can turn others undead
tough undead with high mobility and strength
chaotic evil undead that paralyzes opponents
